definition: A gene that encodes a protein and is located in the mitochondrial DNA.
selection_criteria: it is located in the mitochondrial DNA
referents: mitochondrially encoded NADH dehydrogenase 1 (MT-ND1 aka MTND1, ND1)
mitochondrially encoded ATP synthase 6 (MT-ATP6 aka ATPase6, MTATP6, ATP6)
mitochondrially encoded NADH dehydrogenase 4 (MT-ND4 aka MTND4, ND4)
mitochondrially encoded cytochrome c oxidase II (MT-CO2 aka COII, MTCO2, COX2)
mitochondrially encoded NADH dehydrogenase 5 (MT-ND5 aka MTND5, ND5)
mitochondrially encoded NADH dehydrogenase 2 (MT-ND2 aka MTND2, ND2)
mitochondrially encoded cytochrome c oxidase I (MT-CO1 aka COI, MTCO1, COX1)
mitochondrially encoded NADH dehydrogenase 3 (MT-ND3 aka MTND3, ND3)
mitochondrially encoded NADH dehydrogenase 6 (MT-ND6 aka MTND6, ND6)
mitochondrially encoded cytochrome b (MT-CYB aka MTCYB, CYTB)
mitochondrially encoded cytochrome c oxidase III (MT-CO3 aka COIII, MTCO3, COX3)
mitochondrially encoded ATP synthase 8 (MT-ATP8 aka ATPase8, MTATP8, ATP8)
mitochondrially encoded NADH 4L dehydrogenase (MT-ND4L aka MTND4L, ND4L)
